properties.title: Alston Library

properties.description: The main area will be in the hall which is upstairs (lift available). There will be informal tables and chairs for socialising and lots of things to do, including board games, cards, crosswords, dominoes, newspapers and more.It is planned to offer group activities such as bingo and quizzes. We want to give people what they want, so we will be asking visitors for their ideas and suggestions. The main area (upstairs) is where food and drink will be available from the adjoining kitchen.Downstairs, within Local Links and the library there will be a quieter area for reading and use of the computers. A full range of leaflets offering advice and information will be available to pick up.
properties.title: Alston Town Hall, Alston
